sentences.sContent: They bloom for a month and fade away in no time.
sentences.sContent_eng: They bloom for a month and fade away in no time.
sentences.sCn: 它们开花为一个月的时间和逐渐消失很快。

sentences.sContent: We noticed that these women began to bloom into greater self-confidence and even to shed unhealthy relationships. At that point we knew we were onto something big.
sentences.sContent_eng: We noticed that these women began to bloom into greater self-confidence and even to shed unhealthy relationships. At that point we knew we were onto something big.
sentences.sCn: 我们注意到，这些妇女开始开花到更大的自信，甚至摆脱不健康的关系。在这一点上，我们知道我们正在做一件大事。

phrases.pCn: 水发绿，水华；水藻大量繁殖；湖靛

words.tran: [机] 初轧机；从前女用灯笼裤；纰漏；开花植物

trans.tranOther: if a plant or a flower blooms, its flowers appear or open
